tag_professor: Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Professor Broderick was my favorite professor because he is just so nice to everyone and his lectures are so interesting. I highly recommend you take his courses because you will enjoy them

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: One of the many kind and helpful professors at St. John\'s. He\'s also a Dean and has gone above and beyond to help his students. Don\'t show up to class and you won\'t pass. Gives vey minimal assignments, reading, always shows clips in class, and loves people who participate.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Took him for international crime. Very interesting class. Gives a midterm, a final, and about five homework paper assignments. Can use the notes on exams, which are multiple choice and essay. Fair grader and interesting powerpoints. Would recommend.

tag_professor: Caring (2)  Respected (1)  Inspirational (1)  Participation matters (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Dean Broderick is an amazing professor. He is willing to help his students in any way.
